featured.text: No more loud chatter on the telephones!
John had failed to pay his phone bills for months, so his telephone was ______ last week.

I was sternly criticized for having such an idiotic job, and for the rest of the evening there was general jolly conversation—spoilt only by the fact that I had to take a telephone call in another room, which unfortunately lasted some time.
Which advertisement does not need direct contact by making telephone calls? (Write down the letter representing the advertisement.)

other.text: Or telephone Ms. (2) Have interest or experience in marketing Chang at 2945-0027 for an immediate interview.
Simply removing the jingle of telephones and replacing them with the pleasant sounds of birds has had a remarkable effect on everyone.
Besides, birds are cheaper than telephone service.
She ____ them by using them for taking telephone messages.
First, we replaced all our telephones with carrier pigeons.
This morning I (16) at 6 o’clock by a telephone call that wasn’t for me.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於語音通訊的設備，通常通過電信網絡傳輸聲音。
definition.en_def: A device used for voice communication, typically transmitting sound over a telecommunications network.
definition.example: I called my friend on the telephone to discuss our plans.
